duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement a strategic account plan to drive growth within the account.
Be actively involved in prospect generation to leverage both new and existing opportunities in the account.
Work closely with client teams, pre-sales engineering, and delivery teams to build winning sales proposals and relationships.
Leverage executive-level relationships to enhance company presence.
Serve as a trusted advisor to the assigned customer/s and deliver exceptional client service.
Meet or exceed delivery, revenue, and fulfillment targets shared by senior account leadership.
Operate as the lead point of contact for all matters specific to the assigned customer.
